select SUM(sum) as SUM, ACCOUNT from TRANSACTION where
TRAN_DATE >= STR_TO_DATE('2017-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') and TRAN_DATE <= STR_TO_DATE(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and account in ('농협(매출)','농협(경비)','기업(매출)','기업(경비)','신한(매출)','국민(매출)') group by account
